USERNAME_NOT_EXIST.message: No Account exist with the given username.

ACCOUNT_LOCKED.message: Your Account has been locked out. Please contact your System Admin to reset it.

ACCOUNT_ALREADY_EXIST.message: Account with the given email already exist. Please choose a different email.

USERNAME_VALID.message: Username should be of maximum of 50 character.

PASSWORD_VALID.message: Password should be of maximum of 15 character.
